name: patina-dogfood-v1
description: Strong ground truth benchmark for Patina itself. Each query has explicit relevant_docs (code paths) representing authoritative answers. Used to validate the lab before applying to other projects.

queries.query: How does RRF fusion combine results from multiple oracles?
How does the QueryEngine coordinate parallel oracle retrieval?
What is the Oracle trait interface for retrieval strategies?
How does the semantic oracle perform vector similarity search?
How does the lexical oracle do BM25 full-text search?
How does persona retrieval work for cross-project knowledge?
How does the MCP server handle JSON-RPC requests?
How are embeddings generated using ONNX runtime?
How does the oxidize command build the semantic index?
How does patina scrape extract observations from session files?
How does code scraping extract function signatures?
What is the structure of the unified project config?
How does patina launch different LLM frontends?
How does the Claude adapter set up project files?
How does the mother daemon manage background services?
How are retrieval benchmark metrics calculated?
How does patina ensure safe git branch switching?
How does patina handle containerized Docker builds?
What is the dependable-rust black-box module pattern?
How does Patina apply Unix philosophy to decomposition?
